title: The Very Big Boss
resume: The mayor of Al-Mazareeta, earlier in his life, he met an American woman and had twins with her. One child stayed in Egypt while the other went to America . Once he is on his deathbed, his child that grew up in America goes over to Egypt to claim his father's title. The sons battle to see who will take over, but eventually they realize the value of family, and go through challenges together
